Class Door

  • java.lang.Object
    • sprites.InteractiveTileObject

extends InteractiveTileObject
    Door class representing the activating region and physical body.

      • Door

        public Door(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world,
            com.badlogic.gdx.maps.tiled.TiledMap map,
            com.badlogic.gdx.math.Rectangle bounds,
            boolean locked)
        Instantiates a new door.
        Parameters:
        world - the game world the door inhabits
        map - the map the door is created from
        bounds - bounds of the activating region this is the two neighboring tiles of the door and the door itself
        locked - If the door starts locked
